subtitle: Tangy and tasty, this stroganoff and pasta dish is a quick and complete meal for one.

method.text: Place tagliatelle in a pan of boiling water. Bring to boil then simmer for 8-10 min, or according to pack instructions.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and fry for 1 min until softened slightly. Add pork and mushrooms. Fry for 4-5 min until browned. Transfer pork mixture to a warmed dish and keep warm.
Add the brandy to the pan with the soured cream, orange rind and juice, orange segments, sage and seasoning. Simmer together gently for 1-2 min until warmed through.
Return pork mixture to the pan and mix together. Drain pasta thoroughly. Arrange on a warmed serving plate topped with the pork.

title: Orange and pork stroganoff
